PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-00042023-01-05,  ,  GAC, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectSpecial Economic Measures (Sri Lanka) Permit Authorization Order
PrecisSPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SRI LANKA) PERMIT AUTHORIZATION ORDER in order to authorize the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue to any individual or entity in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada a permit to carry out a specified activity or transaction, or any class of activity or transaction that is otherwise restricted or prohibited pursuant to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0003 Publication Date: 2023-01-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Special Economic Measures (Sri Lanka) Permit Authorization Order
precis: SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SRI LANKA) PERMIT AUTHORIZATION ORDER in order to authorize the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue to any individual or entity in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada a permit to carry out a specified activity or transaction, or any class of activity or transaction that is otherwise restricted or prohibited pursuant to the Regulations.
